name: Index.txt - SFTP push (upload) and pull (download) for externally hosted SFTP service
description: This section explains how to upload (push) and download (pull) files using an externally hosted SFTP (Secure File Transfer Protocol) service. SFTP is a secure way to transfer files between computers over the internet, and this section likely provides instructions or information on how to utilize an external SFTP service for file transfers.
use_cases: Uploading files to an external SFTP server
Downloading files from an external SFTP server
Securely transferring files over the internet
